seo_title: Haritam — Ancestral Tamil Nadu Dining in Mylapore
seo_description: Haritam brings the warmth of a traditional Tamil veedu to the plate — authentic South Indian dishes, brass & wood aesthetic, and heritage hospitality in Mylapore.

hero.title: Haritam
hero.subtitle: Ancestral Tamil home dining, slow-cooked family recipes in a rustic veedu setting.

about.heading: Rooted in Tradition
about.body: Housed in a lovingly restored Tamil veedu, Haritam celebrates the textures of lime-washed walls, Athangudi tiles, teak and thatch. Our food is ultra-authentic South Indian — dosa, idli, pongal, parotta, thali — served only in brass and wood.

contact.address: 13/7, P S Sivaswamy Rd, Sullivan Garden, Mylapore, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600004
